values: Anchor bolts must be embedded ____ into concrete or grouted cells of concrete masonry units.
What is the minimum U-factor for steel framed ceilings in Massachusetts?
Under what conditions can a wood floor or roof trusses be cut?
With the approval of a registered design professional
When the general contractor is present
A type 4 building is also described as _______ construction.
Metal roof shingles shall not be installed on roof slopes below ___ units vertical in ___ units horizontal.
The maximum spacing of collar ties shall be ______ on center.
Which of the following is not a permitted skylight material?

How many days does a Building Inspector have to act on a permit application?
An insurance company that was private is opening to the publi No alterations are being made to the building.  What is required for AAB compliance?
The entrance, bathrooms, water fountains and phone booths
Which of the following is permitted in a building of type 5B construction?

When installed on well drained ground or sand gravel mixture soils

Must be brought into full compliance
Must be brought into partial compliance

No more than 40% of the width
No more than 50% of the width
No more than 30% of the width
Load bearing studs cannot have bored holes

Old mortar must be cleaned from the unit
Units must be free of cracks and other defects
Units must conform to requirements of new units
May not be used under any circumstances

Shall be located within five feet of the entrance to each exit
Shall be no lower than 42” from the floor to the pull handle
Shall be located at the level of discharge only

IRC p9 R114.1 / IBC p answer is amended to match IRC -permit holder

2 ½  hours of water being added
1 ½ hours of water being added
